# numberOfPeriods

**Instance Property**

An integer that indicates the number of periods the product discount is available.

## Declaration

```swift
var numberOfPeriods: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

A product discount may be available for one or more periods. The period, defined in [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProductDiscount/subscriptionPeriod], is a set number of days, weeks, months, or years.

The total length of time that a product discount is available is calculated by multiplying the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProductDiscount/numberOfPeriods] by the period.

Note that the discount period is independent of the product subscription period.

## Getting the Discount Duration

- **subscriptionPeriod**: An object that defines the period for the product discount.
